586    /**
587     * builds Review with checking for non-null required values
588     * @return Review
589     */
590    public Review build() {
591        Objects.requireNonNull(id, Review.class + ": id is missing");
592        Objects.requireNonNull(version, Review.class + ": version is missing");
593        Objects.requireNonNull(createdAt, Review.class + ": createdAt is missing");
594        Objects.requireNonNull(lastModifiedAt, Review.class + ": lastModifiedAt is missing");
595        Objects.requireNonNull(includedInStatistics, Review.class + ": includedInStatistics is missing");
596        return new ReviewImpl(id, version, createdAt, lastModifiedAt, lastModifiedBy, createdBy, key, uniquenessValue,
597            locale, authorName, title, text, target, includedInStatistics, rating, state, customer, custom);
598    }

617    /**
618     * create builder for Review instance
619     * @param template instance with prefilled values for the builder
620     * @return builder
621     */
622    public static ReviewBuilder of(final Review template) {
623        ReviewBuilder builder = new ReviewBuilder();
624        builder.id = template.getId();
625        builder.version = template.getVersion();
626        builder.createdAt = template.getCreatedAt();
627        builder.lastModifiedAt = template.getLastModifiedAt();
628        builder.lastModifiedBy = template.getLastModifiedBy();
629        builder.createdBy = template.getCreatedBy();
630        builder.key = template.getKey();
631        builder.uniquenessValue = template.getUniquenessValue();
632        builder.locale = template.getLocale();
633        builder.authorName = template.getAuthorName();
634        builder.title = template.getTitle();
635        builder.text = template.getText();
636        builder.target = template.getTarget();
637        builder.includedInStatistics = template.getIncludedInStatistics();
638        builder.rating = template.getRating();
639        builder.state = template.getState();
640        builder.customer = template.getCustomer();
641        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
642        return builder;
643    }
